comment: игрока накрывают галлюцинации на арене, он баркает сам

languages.text: Мир внезапно теряет прочность и несомненность, все вокруг выглядит лишь декорацией и подделкой под реальность. Грудь сдавливает ужас.
The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.
languages.original_text: Мир внезапно теряет прочность и несомненность, все вокруг выглядит лишь декорацией и подделкой под реальность. Грудь сдавливает ужас.

traits.locale_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around looks like a decoration and a fake. Horror constricts the chest.
The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts the chest.
The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts the chest.
The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.
The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

languages.text: Le monde perd tout à coup de sa réalité et de son absolu, et tout vous semble relever de l'illusion et de l'imposture. L'horreur vous broie la poitrine.
languages.original_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

traits.locale_text: Le monde perd tout à coup de sa réalité et de son absolu, et tout vous semble relever de l'illusion et de l'imposture. L'horreur broie la poitrine.

languages.text: 周围的世界仿佛突然失去了实体一样，一切看起来都是像虚饰的造物。由于恐惧，你感觉心脏仿佛都收缩起来。
languages.original_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

traits.locale_text: 周围的世界仿佛突然失去了实体一样，一切看起来都是像虚饰的造物。由于恐惧，你感觉心脏仿佛都收缩起来。

languages.text: 突如世界から力と安定が失われ、あなたの周囲のすべてが飾りや見せかけに見える。恐怖があなたの胸を締め付ける。
languages.original_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

traits.locale_text: 突如世界から力と安定が失われ、周囲のすべてが飾りや見せかけに見える。恐怖が胸を締め付けた。

languages.text: Plötzlich verliert die Welt an Kraft und Gewissheit, alles um dich herum wirkt wie Dekoration und reine Täuschung. Entsetzen verengt dir die Brust.
languages.original_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

traits.locale_text: Plötzlich verliert die Welt an Kraft und Gewissheit, alles um sie herum wirkt wie Dekoration und reine Täuschung. Schrecken verengt die Brust.

languages.text: De repente el mundo pierde fuerza y verosimilitud; todo lo que te rodea parece un decorado, una farsa. El terror te atenaza el pecho.
languages.original_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

traits.locale_text: De repente el mundo pierde fuerza y verosimilitud; todo lo que te rodea parece un decorado, una farsa. El terror te atenaza el pecho.

languages.text: Dünya, gücünü yitirip belirsizliğin pençesine düşüyor. Çevrendeki her şeyin bir dekordan ve düzmeceden ibaret olduğunu hissediyorsun. Dehşetin etkisiyle göğsün sıkışıyor.
languages.original_text: The world suddenly loses strength and certainty, everything around you looks like a decoration and a sham. Horror constricts your chest.

traits.locale_text: Dünya, gücünü yitirip belirsizliğin pençesine düşüyor. Çevrendeki her şeyin bir dekordan ve düzmeceden ibaret olduğunu hissediyorsun. Dehşetin etkisiyle göğsün sıkışıyor.
